sentences.en: Alistair saw Henry shrink, as if the words had touched a nerve.
sentences.cn: 阿利斯泰尔看到亨利向后缩了一下，好像那些话触到了他的痛处。

sentences.en: At one point last week shares in the grey market touched 230p.
sentences.cn: 上周，灰市上的股票价格一度高达230便士。

sentences.en: By the third lap Kinkead had touched 289 m.p.h.
sentences.cn: 到第三圈时，金基德的车速达到了每小时289英里。

sentences.en: He touched his forelock in mock deference.
He touched the boy's forehead. It was burning hot.
sentences.cn: 他摸了摸男孩的额头,烧得烫手.

sentences.en: He touched the cow's side with his stick.
sentences.cn: 他用棍子碰了碰牛的肋部。

sentences.en: He was touched that we came.
His crinkly hair was touched with grey.
sentences.cn: 他卷曲的头发有些花白。

sentences.en: His diet is vegetarian, and he hasn't touched meat for six years.
sentences.cn: 他吃素，已经6年不知肉味了。

sentences.en: I was in the garden. I never touched the sandwiches.
sentences.cn: 我那时在花园里。我根本没动三明治。

sentences.en: I was touched to find that he regards me as engaging.
sentences.cn: 他认为我很迷人，这真令我感动。

sentences.en: It has touched me deeply to see how these people live.
sentences.cn: 看到这些人的生活境况，我深受触动。

sentences.en: She touched the thick mat of sandy hair on his chest.
sentences.cn: 她摸着他那浓密的淡棕色胸毛。

sentences.en: The mere mention of John had touched a very raw nerve indeed.
sentences.cn: 提到约翰就真的让人心痛。

sentences.en: The winds had touched storm-force the day before.
sentences.cn: 风力前一天就已达到了狂风级。

words.tran_cn: 可触的；可使感动的；可食用的

phrases.tran_cn: 最后一触，最后一笔；最后润色
联系；能达到的；在…的附近
轻触；低干涉（一种经营模式）
第一次接触（英国女子组合甜心宝贝的专辑）

trans.tran_cn: 精神失常的，受感动的，有一点，略微带点
trans.tran_en: feeling happy and grateful because of what someone has done

trans.tran_cn: 接触，触摸( touch的过去式和过去分词 )，吃，涉及，与…有关
